Parameters: The current status of location availability.
onLocationAvailability(com.google.androi.Description: Called when there is a change in the availability of location data. When @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability#isLocationAvailable_E@ returns false you can assume that location will not be returned in @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationCallback#onLocationResult_E@ until something changes in the device's settings or environment. Even when @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationAvailability#isLocationAvailable_E@ returns true the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationCallback#onLocationResult_E@ may not always be called regularly, however the device location is known and both the most recently delivered location and @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi#getLastLocation_E@ will be reasonably up to date given the hints specified by the active @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@s.

onLocationResult(com.google.android.gms..Description: Called when device location information is available. The most recent location returned by @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationResult#getLastLocation_E@ is not guaranteed to be immediately fresh, but will be reasonably up to date given the hints specified by the active @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationRequest_E@s.

ClassDesc: Used for receiving notifications from the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi_E@ when the device location has changed or can no longer be determined. The methods are called if the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#LocationCallback_E@ has been registered with the location client using the @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi#requestLocationUpdates_E@ method.
